metadata.title: CVE-2024-23837 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: LibHTP is a security-aware parser for the HTTP protocol. Crafted trafficcan cause excessive processing time of HTTP headers, leading to denial ofservice. This issue is addressed in 0.5.46.

criterions.comment: libhtp package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
